name: The Strongest Blade in the World
name_original: The Strongest Blade in the World
description:
Made for Dril Jam it's a game (?) about the "strongest blade in the world, howeve,r it is so fragile as to shatter when handled by any force other than the delicate touch of a lesbian ."  It's very silly and was made in a few hours.

I used image to bitsy to help make this!
